name: Eventmag.ru
overview:
Eventmag is an online e-ticket service. It is an open platform, free for use and only charges organisers when they sell tickets. Eventmag is an internet platform for event organisers which enables individual people to big companies all over Russia plan, promote, and sell out any event. With Eventmag it is very easy to post the event, send out invitations and start collecting online payments and data from participants. Eventmag serves the needs of any event whether it is a big concert or birthday party. It is also integrated with all most popular social networks.

Launched in April 2012, Eventmag is based on a globally successful model, funded by Fast Lane Ventures and ru-Net. It is headed by CEO Natalya Atyasheva – a strong professional with 15 years of experience in professional events business.

milestones.description: Eventbrite Copycat Eventmag Russia Gets Fast Lane And ru-Net Backing
milestones.source_description: Eventbrite Copycat Eventmag Russia Gets Fast Lane And ru-Net Backing
